name: Margherita
description: Classic pizza topped with mozzarella and tomato sauce.

name: Pepperoni
description: Pepperoni pizza with mozzarella, spicy sausage, and tomato sauce.

name: Chicken Biryani
description: Aromatic basmati rice cooked with juicy chicken and spices.

name: Veg Biryani
description: Basmati rice cooked with mixed vegetables and aromatic spices.

name: Cheese Burger
description: Grilled patty with melted cheese, lettuce, and tomato in a soft bun.

name: Veggie Burger
description: Crispy veggie patty with fresh veggies and creamy sauce.

name: Paneer Roll
description: Paneer and veggies rolled in a warm paratha with sauces.

name: Chicken Kathi Roll
description: Spiced chicken wrapped in a flaky paratha with chutneys.

name: Cold Coffee
description: Iced coffee blended with milk, sugar, and a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

name: Lemon Soda
description: Refreshing fizzy drink with lemon juice and mint.
